title: Bug 120922: "Dirty Page" behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement
description: When editing the XML in the "source" view of the Layout Editor and then attempting to switch back to the Layout view, an error message is displayed indicating the need to save changes. The user is then prompted with the options to save, discard, or cancel the changes. However, the dialog box is titled "Error". This behavior is problematic because the user is left to figure out how to save or discard the changes, and the error message itself is not clear.
OB: When editing XML in the "source" view and switching to the Layout view without saving changes, an error message is displayed.
EB: When attempting to switch from the "source" view to the Layout view without saving changes, a clear prompt should be displayed to save or discard changes before navigating to the Layout view.
SR:
1. Open XML Report Designer editor.
2. Edit the XML in the "source" view.
3. Attempt to switch to the Layout view without saving changes.
4. Observe the error message and prompt to save or discard changes.
